HGE::Channel_SetPitch

Changes an audio channel pitch. 

void Channel_SetPitch(
  HCHANNEL channel,
  float pitch
);

Parameters

channel
Handle of an audio channel to be modified.
pitch
New pitch multiplier, 1.0 means default pitch.

Requirements

Header: hge.h
Import library: hge.lib

See also

Channel_SetPanning, Channel_SetVolume
